data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 5,039 believers in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Mlabri people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Thailand.
